New Records: Jack Leiter struck out a career-high six batters
Key Match Events: Jack Leiter allowed three runs over five-plus innings
Jack Leiter hit Zach Neto with a pitch and allowed him to score
Taylor Ward sent the pitch 385 feet to left-center for a home run
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Bruce Bochy said he might have allowed Leiter to keep going if the first runner hadn’t reached base
Jack Leiter said he has a conscious effort to slow it down and control the adrenaline
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Smith said Jack Leiter was really good tonight and kept the team in the game
Jack Leiter echoed that sentiment, noting that he’s very routine oriented, almost to a fault
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers pulled out a 6-4 win over the Angels on Saturday night at Globe Life Field
Jack Leiter induced 20 whiffs as he overpowered the Angels' lineup for much of the night
The 20 swings and misses were tied with Nathan Eovaldi and Max Scherzer for the fourth-most among Texas pitchers this season
Others: Jack Leiter's four-seam fastball had 12 swings and misses, which is tied for the second most four-seam whiffs by a Rangers pitcher in 2024
